issue.title: [Rust] Implement SQL tokenizer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8828](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8828). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement enum for all supported SQL tokens and implement a tokenizer that can tokenize a SQL string and produce a Vec<SQLToken>.
